    • Constructor Detail

      • Tile

        public Tile(TileTypes type)
        Constructor used to create a new Tile. Uses a switch statement to initialise a tile based on the case it satisfies and executes specific things respective of the case it satisfies.
        Parameters:
        type - the tile type which is being created

        public boolean getHidesRats()

      • areItemsPlaceable

        public boolean areItemsPlaceable()
        Method used to check if items are placeable
        Returns:
